name: Red Flower: Chapter 1
description:
The country of Rocle'in, a corrupt bastion of human dominance. Has seated itself as a human superiority complex nation. All non-human races have been banished. Some humans in key roles of government argue that this "racist isolationism" mentality will only lead their great nation into ruin. One such man, your father, Michael has been labeled as an "Equalist". A person who believes that everyone, regardless of race or gender, should be able to live and pursue happiness inside our nation.
Without the fear of being persecuted...
